interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: BRING GREEN Artemisia Calming Real Pack 100g - Redness Relief Skin Soothing & Moisturizing Facial Wash off Mask, Mild Salicylic Acid Natural Ingredients Skin Care, for Senstive & Damaged Skin
Review Date: 2020/08/08
Store: BRING GREEN
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like the cooling effect it gave when I applied it to my skin. It comes with a big spatula that you use to apply and remove the gel. I use this 1-2x week to give my irritated skin a break. Had to refer back to their amazon product page to get the directions on how to use and for how long. I apply a good amount to my face and leave it on for 20 minutes. The gel smells very herbal and has tiny bits of artemisia leaf in it.  The mask did help reduce the redness on my cheeks and nose. It left my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed. Definitely recommend for people with irritated and oily skin or after a long week of wearing a tight N95 mask.
Review Title: Very cooling
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[miclan] Honey Teatree Relaxing Mask 10pcs - Mediheal Family Brand Facial Sheet Mask Full of Hydrating Soothing Purifying Skin with Teatree and Honey
miclan
{'Brand': 'Miclan', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Soothing,Skin Soothing,Soothes', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '7.91 x 4.25 x 1.5 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
Great mask to use after a long day. The mask is well coated with the honey tea tree serum on a mesh-like sheet. I use the extra serum in the package and apply it on my neck and arms. It's soothing and refreshing, and the scent is not to strong. It made my skin feel soft and supple. It didn't irritate my skin at all. Next time, I'll put it in fridge prior to using for a more cooling experience.
Great face mask
Silicone Back Scrubber For Shower,Strong Rub Back Mud Silica Gel Bath Towel, Easy to Clean, All Parts Of The Body To Remove Ash And Mud
LHIUEM
{'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'LHIUEM', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.87 x 2.48 inches; 1.21 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523116391'}
It does lightly scrub the back a bit. Lathers and spreads the body wash well, however, it is sort of heavy and a pain to use. I’ll still use it but not on a daily basis. I hang it over the shower door because there’s no where to rest it in the tub area
It’s okay
BRING GREEN Artemisia Calming Real Pack 100g - Redness Relief Skin Soothing & Moisturizing Facial Wash off Mask, Mild Salicylic Acid Natural Ingredients Skin Care, for Senstive & Damaged Skin
BRING GREEN
{'Brand': 'BRING GREEN', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'acne prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 2.9 x 2.9 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
I like the cooling effect it gave when I applied it to my skin. It comes with a big spatula that you use to apply and remove the gel. I use this 1-2x week to give my irritated skin a break. Had to refer back to their amazon product page to get the directions on how to use and for how long. I apply a good amount to my face and leave it on for 20 minutes. The gel smells very herbal and has tiny bits of artemisia leaf in it.  The mask did help reduce the redness on my cheeks and nose. It left my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed. Definitely recommend for people with irritated and oily skin or after a long week of wearing a tight N95 mask.
Very cooling
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Strong affinity for facial sheet masks with soothing and hydrating properties, alongside a growing interest in wash-off masks that provide calming benefits for sensitive skin. 

- **Ingredients:** Prefers products featuring natural ingredients such as honey and tea tree, with an emerging interest in formulations that include calming botanical extracts like artemisia. 

- **Usage Context:** Likely to use skincare products as self-care, particularly after stressful days or prolonged mask wear, highlighting a need for soothing solutions that alleviate skin irritation.

- **Texture and Scent:** Values well-coated masks with mild or herbal scents, indicating a dislike for overpowering fragrances. Enjoys the convenience of application tools, such as spatulas, to enhance the skincare experience.

- **Sensory Experience:** Appreciates cooling effects from applications, suggesting that temperature variation helps enhance satisfaction. Shows a preference for products that are easy to use and beneficial for irritated or oily skin, while still welcoming practical solutions.

- **Overall Sentiment:** Generally positive attitude towards product effectiveness and sensory satisfaction. Although flexible in product expectations, prefers high-rated items and is open to exploring varying functionalities, particularly those that offer comfort and rejuvenation.

This profile reflects the user’s dedication to gentle, natural skincare while emphasizing a focus on soothing and restorative routines.
